meanings.definition: A sailboat with a single sail set on a mast mounted far forward.
meanings.sent1: The catboats glided gracefully across the water with their single sails.
meanings.sent2: We saw several catboats sailing in the bay during the regatta.
meanings.sent3: The catboats seemed to be racing each other, but they were just drifting in the wind.
meanings.sent4: The catboats were like elegant dancers on the sea, moving in perfect harmony.
meanings.sent5: The image of the catboats sailing under the golden sun was etched in my memory.

meanings.definition: A type of boat with a single mast and a single sail.
meanings.sent1: The fishermen used catboats to navigate the calm waters of the lake.
meanings.sent2: Many tourists enjoy renting catboats for a relaxing day on the river.
meanings.sent3: The catboats bobbed gently on the water, looking like floating toys.
meanings.sent4: In the distance, the catboats appeared like tiny dots against the vast ocean.
meanings.sent5: The sound of the catboats cutting through the waves was soothing to the ears.
